Returns: True if this Row can be rendered in a visible row view, false otherwise.
isRenderedAsRowView().Description: Returns true if this Row can be rendered in a visible row view, false otherwise. For example @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ListRow_E@ is rendered by @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ListRowPresenter_E@. @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PageRow_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#SectionRow_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DividerRow_E@ are rendered as invisible row views.

ClassDesc: Used to represent section item in HeadersFragment. Unlike a normal Row, it's not focusable.
